LanguageData.SafeTemperature_SeekSafeTemperatureInter: Pawns interrupt current job to seek safe temperature
In vanilla, pawns only seek safe temperature between jobs. Enable this setting to force them to seek safe temperature when needed.
Pawns will interrupt their work to seek safe temperature, if needed, after this many ticks.
LanguageData.SafeTemperature_UseSuboptimalTemperature: Enable to consider areas with less-than-ideal temperature in case no area is found within a pawn's comfortable temperature range. This means pawns will seek the safest area possible even when no area is totally safe.
LanguageData.SafeTemperature_AllowUndercorrectingDesc: Enable to consider areas that will only slow down temperature injury when nothing else is available.
LanguageData.SafeTemperature_RegionCachingExpiryTicks: Ticks after which suboptimal temperature regions must be recalculated.
LanguageData.SafeTemperature_HypothermiaSeverityRange: The hypothermia severity range that pawns will try to stay in. When at the maximum of the range, pawns will seek warmth and wait there until they reach the minimum of the range.
LanguageData.SafeTemperature_HeatstrokeSeverityRangeD: The heatstroke severity range that pawns will try to stay in. When at the maximum of the range, pawns will seek a cool area and wait there until they reach the minimum of the range.
